functions.tag: {ChuzData:{ItemID:ender_glaive,ItemMode:standby},Recipes:["minecraft:crafting_table"],display:{Name:'{"text":"Ender Throw","color":"#ee37ff","italic":false}',Lore:['{"text":" "}','[{"text":"[","color":"white","italic":false},{"keybind":"key.use","color":"gold","italic":false},{"text":"]でディスクを投げる。","color":"white","italic":false}]','[{"text":"[","color":"white","italic":false},{"keybind":"key.sneak","color":"gold","italic":false},{"text":"]でディスクの位置にテレポートする。","color":"white","italic":false}]','[{"text":"[","color":"white","italic":false},{"keybind":"key.sneak","color":"gold","italic":false},{"text":"]を押し続けることでチャージできる。","color":"white","italic":false}]','[{"text":"チャージして投げたディスクにテレポートすると、","color":"white","italic":false}]','{"text":"テレポートと同時に範囲攻撃を発生させる。","color":"white","italic":false}','{"text":" "}','{"text":"エンダーマンたちの能力から着想を得たもの","color":"gray","italic":false}']},HideFlags:39,CustomModelData:22,AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName: "generic.attack_damage", Name: "generic.attackDamage", Amount: 6.5d, Operation: 0, UUID: [I; 0, 862369, 0, 539149], Slot: "mainhand"},{AttributeName: "generic.attack_speed", Name: "generic.attackSpeed", Amount: -2.6d, Operation: 0, UUID: [I; 0, 268925, 0, 119966], Slot:mainhand}]}
